about_the_game:
🚀 GAME DEMO VERSION 🚀

This demo version lets you immerse yourself in the cyberpunk world, but it has limitations: only 9 in-game days are available, and the ability to upgrade armor and weapons is restricted. The full version has no time limits and unlocks all customization, character development, and survival features in this harsh world.

--------------------------------------------------

In a world where megacorporation's rule the cities and freedom has become a commodity, you are a dreamer who paid a high price for a chance at a better life. Fifteen thousand dollars. That’s the debt you took on to gain access to a secret mercenary platform, where people become agents and their fates are forged in the shadows.

You’ve made a choice that will change your life forever. Will it lead you to greatness, or will you drown in the neon abyss of despair? In this world, every contract is a risk, every decision a moral boundary.

Hardcore Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Text RPG

This is not just a game—it’s a test of your decisions, tactics, and resilience. Every choice you make is irreversible. There are no Save-Load options. You live with the consequences of your actions.

This single-player RPG immerses you in a gripping experience of growth and survival. Develop unique attributes, master various weapons, and refine your skills as you navigate a world where every decision shapes your fate.

Key Features

🔥 Dice-based combat system – Your fate depends on your skills, strategy, and luck.

🔫 Diverse combat styles – Choose between firearms, melee weapons, or heavy weaponry. Improve stealth, hacking, or combat abilities to unlock unique solutions.

🌆 The life of an agent – Beyond missions, manage your condition: food, sleep, health. Relax in bars or train in gyms, but always be prepared for the next task.

⚖️ Moral dilemmas – Your choice between Aegis and the Resistance determines not just the story, but your fate. Every decision carries weight.

Beneath the neon glow and suffocating smog, millions live just like you. In this world, you are not just a mercenary—you are a person fighting for the chance to reclaim your freedom.

Are you ready to take the risk and step into the Shadows?

name: Agent Dunoz Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In a dystopian world ruled by megacorporation's, you're a mercenary with a $15,000 debt. Face dice-based combat, moral dilemmas, and irreversible choices in this hardcore Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Text RPG. Will you reclaim your freedom or vanish in the shadows?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
